name: pandas.DataFrame.set_index
description: Set the DataFrame index using existing columns.

args.name: keys
args.type: label or array-like or list of labels/arrays

drop.description: Delete columns to be used as the new index.

append.description: Whether to append columns to existing index.

inplace.description: Modify the DataFrame in place (do not create a new object).

verify_integrity.description: Check the new index for duplicates. Otherwise defer the check until necessary. Setting to False will improve the performance of this method.
